Episodes.Title: Episode One
Episodes.Plot: Finn and Jess are zipping up those iconic orange jumpsuits for their first day of community service and meeting their probation worker... or is it their new probation worker? Things become stranger still when a man stumbles into the community centre with a briefcase and a power that infects them all. The truth unravels in a series of tense flashbacks and it's soon clear to Finn and Jess that there's more to community service than scrubbing off graffiti and picking up litter...
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language
Episodes.GuestStars: Joseph Gilgun, Nathan Stewart-Jarrett, Matthew McNulty

Episodes.Title: Episode Two
Episodes.Plot: Finn isn't quite as innocent as he looks when a dark secret he's been hiding at home is revealed. Can Seth be persuaded to come out of retirement and take a power before someone gets forced into submission? And Rudy and Curtis go into battle over a beautiful blind girl, while Jess meets new super-sexy barman Alex.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Episode Three
Episodes.Plot: Rudy and his down-beat doppelganger are forced to unite as they have to confront a long-forgotten face from their shared past. Can they put aside their differences in time to save themselves from the killer? There's also a lot of hits going on... Jess hits on handsome Alex from the bar, Curtis hits on Lola the mysterious trainee probation worker, and Finn hits on his step-mum.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Episode Four
Episodes.Plot: When Curtis's new girlfriend Lola disappears, Curtis discovers that she was never the person she claimed to be. As he investigates further, he is forced to use his power to bring someone back from the dead, with disastrous results. Meanwhile, Rudy and Finn have a disagreement about their shared living arrangements at the community centre, and Jess finally gets closer to mysterious barman Alex.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Graphic violence, horror, sex scenes & offensive language

Episodes.Title: Episode Five
Episodes.Plot: Finn finally tracks down his real father, only to discover that he's close to death. As he tries to build a relationship with him, Finn realises that his newly discovered half-sister might know more about their father's illness than she's letting on. Finn continues his sleuthing in an attempt to win Jess's affection by discovering Alex's hidden secret.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Episode Six
Episodes.Plot: The gang spend a long night at a wild house party where they are stalked by a mysterious killer rabbit. While tracking it down, Rudy meets the enigmatic Nadine and finds himself head over heels for the first time in his life. By the time the night has drawn to a close, Alex has finally revealed to Jess the secret he has been trying to hide - but will their relationship survive his shock revelation?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Episode Seven
Episodes.Plot: Alex sets off on a mission to try to recover what's missing in his life, but Jess is worried about the extreme lengths he might go to. Meanwhile, a mysterious girl called Abby arrives at the community centre. She pretends to be on community service, but ends up with an unexpected gift when she discovers that the community centre is the super-power magnet of the universe.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: Episode Eight
Episodes.Plot: Rudy's passion for Nadine is put to the test when he tries to persuade her that they have a future together. Suspecting that she is keeping something from him, he finally discovers her secret, and the truth takes on biblical proportions when the gang discover her super-power.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
